languages.text: {n}Караэль несколько мгновений переводит дух, давясь собственной яростью. Наконец, явно превозмогая себя, он шепчет:{/n} "Я буду хранить молчание, Эзирраеш".
{n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."
languages.original_text: {n}Караэль несколько мгновений переводит дух, давясь собственной яростью. Наконец, явно превозмогая себя, он шепчет:{/n} "Я буду хранить молчание, Эзирраеш".

{n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

languages.text: {n}Kharael braucht kurz, um zu Atem zu kommen, er erstickt an seiner eigenen Wut. Schließlich bringt er seine Emotionen unter Kontrolle und flüstert:{/n} "Ich werde schweigen, Aezyrraesh."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael braucht kurz, um zu Atem zu kommen, er erstickt an seiner eigenen Wut. Schließlich bringt er seine Emotionen unter Kontrolle und flüstert:{/n} "Ich werde schweigen, Aezyrraesh."

languages.text: {n}卡瑞尔愤怒不已，连话都说不出来了。他花了几分钟才缓了过来，克制住了自己的情绪，轻声说道。{/n}“我对此保持沉默，艾泽拉什。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡瑞尔愤怒不已，连话都说不出来了。他花了几分钟才缓了过来，克制住了自己的情绪，轻声说道。{/n}“我对此保持沉默，艾泽拉什。”

languages.text: {n}Kharael, suffoquant de rage, tente de reprendre ses esprits. De nouveau maître de ses émotions, il souffle :{/n} « Je me tairai, Aezyrraesh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael, suffoquant de rage, tente de reprendre ses esprits. De nouveau maître de ses émotions, il souffle :{/n} « Je me tairai, Aezyrraesh. »

languages.text: {n}Kharael para unos momentos para recuperar el aliento, atragantado por su propia ira. Al fin, logra controlar sus emociones y susurra:{/n} «No diré nada, Aezyrraesh».
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kharael para unos momentos para recuperar el aliento, atragantado por su propia ira. Al fin, logra controlar sus emociones y susurra:{/n} «No diré nada, Aezyrraesh».

languages.text: {n}怒りで息を詰まらせるカラエルは、呼吸を整えるのに少しの時間を要する。やがて、なんとか自分の感情をコントロールし、そしてささやく。{/n}「私は何も言わない、アエジレシュ」
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."

traits.locale_text: {n}怒りで息を詰まらせるカラエルは、呼吸を整えるのに少しの時間を要する。やがて、なんとか自分の感情をコントロールし、そしてささやく。{/n}「私は何も言わない、アエジレシュ」

languages.text: {n}Kharael bir süre durup, öfkeyle boğulmuş nefesini topluyor. Sonunda duygularını kontrol altına almayı başarıyor ve fısıldıyor:{/n} "Sessiz kalacağım Aezyrraesh."
languages.original_text: {n}Kharael takes a few moments to catch his breath, choking on his own rage. At last, he manages to get his emotions under control and whispers,{/n} "I will remain silent, Aezyrraesh."
